remarks: In an ordered group, strict ordering is compatible with group addition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Sep-2018.)
statement:
ogrpsublt.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ogrpsublt.1 $e |- .< = ( lt ` G ) $.
ogrpsublt.2 $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
ogrpsublt $p |- ( ( G e. oGrp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X .< Y ) -> ( X .- Z ) .< ( Y .- Z ) ) $.
